summary: Utilities for stitching synthesized audio segments.

top_level_symbols.name: load_wav
top_level_symbols.doc:
Load a WAV file as mono ``float32`` samples. Args:
    path: Input WAV file path.

top_level_symbols.name: ensure_mono
top_level_symbols.doc: Collapse stereo signals to mono by averaging channels.

top_level_symbols.name: silence
top_level_symbols.doc: Return a block of digital silence.

top_level_symbols.name: assemble
top_level_symbols.doc:
Stitch a sequence of span WAVs with pauses and crossfades. Args:
    span_paths: Ordered list of WAV files to concatenate.
